description: The term "Pyramid TIFF" is used for a TIFF file that wraps a sequence of bitmaps that each represent the same image at increasingly coarse spatial resolutions.  The individual images may be compressed or tiled.  At least two different approaches to representing multi-resolution images using the TIFF IFD structure are found in practice.
name: TIFF, Pyramid
